name: ofldfld

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, cofld), wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c0, corng))
stmt.pretty: simplbi(c0 ∈ oField, c0 ∈ Field, c0 ∈ oRing)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cofld), wcel(c0, cfield))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cofld), wa(wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c0, corng)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ oField → c0 ∈ Field)
⊣ (c0 ∈ oField ↔(c0 ∈ Field ∧ c0 ∈ oRing))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cofld), wcel(c0, cfield))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cofld), wa(wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c0, corng)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ oField → c0 ∈ Field)
⊣ (c0 ∈ oField ↔(c0 ∈ Field ∧ c0 ∈ oRing))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, cofld), wa(wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c0, corng)))

comment: An ordered field is a field. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Jan-2018.)
